column1: Maritime Engineering Science: Ocean Energy & Offshore Engineering MSc
column3: Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences
column5: Study ocean energy and offshore engineering on this MSc course at the University of Southampton. This master’s degree will give you expert knowledge about the science behind natural energy resources. You’ll be well prepared for a range of offshore engineering specialisms, and will graduate with the skills to move into a career in the maritime sector.This Maritime Engineering Science: Ocean Energy and Offshore Engineering MSc is one of 5 maritime engineering science specialisms you can study at the University of Southampton.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
